transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaskar sir.
Customer: Hmm, boliye.
Executive: Ji Pratyaksh baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se aapka account manager kaise hai sir?
Customer: Chal raha hai aapka boliye khabar.
Executive: Ji aapka call aaya tha sir hamare customer care number pe kya jankari janna chahte the batayenge.
Customer: Call to sir 2 baje kiya aapko abhi reply kar raha hai.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Call to aapko 2 baje kiya tha hum.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Ha to bataiye sir kya bataiye na kya hua kis regarding aapne connect kiya tha.
Customer: Call stand ho gaya actually hum call kiya tha.
Executive: Ha bataiye.
Customer: Lead nahi aa raha sahi se.
Executive: Lead kaise lead kaise kaise lead chahiye aapko batao.
Customer: Mera to West Bengal mein baitha hai na hum.
Executive: West Bengal.
Customer: To West Bengal lead West Bengal mein.
Executive: West Bengal mein baithe.
Customer: West Bengal mein koi lead nahi aa raha hai mera.
Executive: Lead diya tha aapko.
Customer: Laser cutting.
Executive: Check kar leta hun.
Customer: Aapka aawaz nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Laser cutting chahiye aapko.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aawaz aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi aa raha aawaz.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Aap aa raha hai aawaz?
Customer: Nahi aa raha aawaz.
Customer: Call kat ke call back karenge.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir aap aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm boliye.
Customer: Laser cutting machine ka chahiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Laser cutting machine chahiye aapko.
Customer: Aapka aawaz nahi aa raha hai sir call kat ke call back kariye na.
Executive: Call cut dijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting leads in West Bengal.

- Customer needs leads for laser cutting machine.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check the lead details.

- Executive asked the customer to call back.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive asked the customer to call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, west bengal, laser cutting
